title: Raohe Street Night Market
intro: One of the oldest night markets in Taipei. Famous for its Pepper Buns and vibrant atmosphere next to the temple.

title: Elephant Mountain Trail
intro: A short hike offering the best panoramic views of Taipei 101 and the city skyline. Best visited at sunset.

title: Pier-2 Art Center
intro: Abandoned warehouses turned into a vibrant open-air art gallery, shops, and exhibition spaces by the harbor.

title: Sun Moon Lake Cycling
intro: Rated as one of the most beautiful cycling routes in the world. Enjoy the serene lake views and temples.

title: National Palace Museum
intro: Home to one of the largest collections of Chinese artifacts and artworks in the world. A must for history lovers.

title: Liuhe Night Market
intro: A spacious, pedestrian-friendly night market in Kaohsiung known for its fresh seafood and papaya milk.

title: Taroko Gorge Trail
intro: World-class marble gorge with stunning hiking trails. Shakadang and Yanzikou trails are accessible for families.

title: Penghu Fireworks Festival
intro: An annual summer event featuring spectacular firework shows over the ocean near the Guanyinting Recreation Area.
